eu.amidst.core.utils

Class MultinomialIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.utils.MultinomialIndex

  • public final class MultinomialIndex
extends Object
    This class implements various useful methods for indexing arrays of distributions involving multinomial variables.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(List<Variable> vars,
                                                 Assignment assignment)
        Returns the index of an assignment given a set of multinomial variables and a corresponding assignment. Example: Let X, Y and Z three multinomial variables with states {0,1}, {0,1} and {0,1,2} respectively. Then, they are indexed as: X Y Z Index 0 0 0 0 1 0 0 1 0 1 0 2 1 1 0 3 0 0 1 4 1 0 1 5 0 1 1 6 1 1 1 7 0 0 2 8 1 0 2 9 0 1 2 10 1 1 2 11 So, for instance Index(0,0,2) = 8.
        Parameters:
        vars - a List of Variable.
        assignment - an Assignment for a set of variables.
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding input assignment.

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(List<Variable> vars,
                                                 List<Double> assignment)
        Returns the index of an assignment given the set of multinomial variables and their corresponding values.
        Parameters:
        vars - a List of Variable.
        assignment - a List of double values for the variables in the same order.
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding input assignment.

      • getIndexFromDataInstance

        public static int getIndexFromDataInstance(List<Variable> vars,
                                           DataInstance dataInstance)
        Returns the index of an assignment given a set of multinomial variables and a DataInstance.
        Parameters:
        vars - a List of Variable.
        dataInstance - a DataInstance including values for the input set of variables.
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding input dataInstance.

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(List<Variable> vars,
                                                 double[] assignment)
        Returns the index of an assignment given a set of multinomial variables and their corresponding values.
        Parameters:
        vars - a List of Variable.
        assignment - an array of double including the values of variables in the same order.
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding input assignment.

      • getVariableArrayAssignmentFromIndex

        public static double[] getVariableArrayAssignmentFromIndex(List<Variable> vars,
                                                           int index)
        Returns an assignment given a list of variables and an input index.
        Parameters:
        vars - a List of Variable.
        index - the index of the Assignment.
        Returns:
        an array of double with the values of the input variables, i.e., the assignment.
